messages.title: A fresh start for Bournemouth
messages.content: Alasdair Murray offers the only real chance for change here.

messages.title: too close to call
messages.content: This area is one of the closest results in the country. Just a 5 percent swing is needed for the Lib Dems to gain their 2nd MP in Dorset. Labour has no chance of winning here, coming last among the major parties. So you can't vote out Gordon Brown here. But you can back me as an MP who will be committed full time to work for you. With such a close result expected, every vote will count.

mentions.candidate: Alasdair Murray grew up in Southampton and has family in Bournemouth. He’s determined to be a local MP, based here and fighting for local residents.
mentions.tacticalSituation: This area is one of the closest results in the country. Just a 5 percent swing is needed for the Lib Dems to gain their 2nd MP in Dorset. Labour has no chance of winning here, coming last among the major parties. So you can't vote out Gordon Brown here.

housing.content: only Alasdair Murray offers the only real chance for change here

leaflet.personalStatement: Alasdair Murray grew up in Southampton and has family in Bournemouth. He’s determined to be a local MP, based here and fighting for local residents.

politicalExperience.achievements: Alasdair Murray is educated at Oxford University and has worked as an economics journalist and policy expert, he’s well placed to speak up for our area with authority.

endorsements.endorsement: Only Alasdair Murray offers the only real chance for change here

images.caption: Alasdair with his wife Claire and sons Calum and Dylan
